channel.title: POST on Umbrella Research by Petarducu
channel.description: Recent content in POST on Umbrella Research by Petarducu

item.title: The "Digital Trinity"
item.description: Introduction. I’d like to share several conclusions before I have worked on different research. This post has been written during that process to summarize some thoughts about digital acquisition in Public Administration. I have been refined my service models to improve digital process in public sector – “Modern Public Administration”, which seem like the “Modern Company” but with the related public restrictions. The first step in this journey was: how to migrate to digital acquisition.

item.title: Modern Public Administration
item.description: Modern Public Administration and the Citizen’s Sovereignty The challenges The new challenges of Public Administration are infinite, the constant humanitarian crisis, wars, the globalization, are changing the society. Today one of the most important challenges is the time, to manage, to act, to resolve all kind of circumstances. The point is how the technology could help us to achieve these goals more quickly, because in private business it’s possible.

item.title: Humanitarian Help
item.description: From the last years to nowadays, recent Humanitarian events, sanitarian crisis call to action. The power of the Humankind is in their collective memory about our history and what it would happen whether we don’t do anything. the well-known term, CoI (Cost of Inaction) teach us about passed experiences since the last 100 years. We need to restart and change our world for the future. New Principals and values can be built through the new vision of technology.

item.title: 1st Post
item.description: This is my new post to start with new contents about: - Business, Technology, and People. I’ll create new content and new ideas. 1. [Empathize] 2. [Define] 3. [Ideate] 4. [Prototype] 5. [Test] 6. [Play the game]
